TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DbType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the data type of a field, a property, or a object of a .NET Framework data provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The type of a parameter is specific to the .NET Framework data provider. Specifying the type converts the value of the `Parameter` to the data provider Type before passing the value to the data source. If the type is not specified, ADO.NET infers the data provider Type of the `Parameter` from the `Value` property of the `Parameter` object.
You can also generically specify the type of a `Parameter` by setting `DbType` property of a `Parameter` object.
ADO.NET cannot correctly infer the type if a byte array is larger than 8,000 bytes. Explicitly specify the DbType when working with byte arrays larger than 8,000 bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType AnsiString = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A variable-length stream of non-Unicode characters ranging between 1 and 8,000 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType AnsiStringFixedLength = int32(22)

Docs.summary: A fixed-length stream of non-Unicode characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Binary = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A variable-length stream of binary data ranging between 1 and 8,000 bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Boolean = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A simple type representing Boolean values of or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Byte = int32(2)

Docs.summary: An 8-bit unsigned integer ranging in value from 0 to 255.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Currency = int32(4)

Docs.summary: A currency value ranging from -2 63 (or -922,337,203,685,477.5808) to 2 63 -1 (or +922,337,203,685,477.5807) with an accuracy to a ten-thousandth of a currency unit.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Date = int32(5)

Docs.summary: A type representing a date value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType DateTime = int32(6)

Docs.summary: A type representing a date and time value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType DateTime2 = int32(26)

Docs.summary: Date and time data. Date value range is from January 1,1 AD through December 31, 9999 AD. Time value range is 00:00:00 through 23:59:59.9999999 with an accuracy of 100 nanoseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType DateTimeOffset = int32(27)

Docs.summary: Date and time data with time zone awareness. Date value range is from January 1,1 AD through December 31, 9999 AD. Time value range is 00:00:00 through 23:59:59.9999999 with an accuracy of 100 nanoseconds. Time zone value range is -14:00 through +14:00.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Decimal = int32(7)

Docs.summary: A simple type representing values ranging from 1.0 x 10 -28 to approximately 7.9 x 10 28 with 28-29 significant digits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Double = int32(8)

Docs.summary: A floating point type representing values ranging from approximately 5.0 x 10 -324 to 1.7 x 10 308 with a precision of 15-16 digits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Guid = int32(9)

Docs.summary: A globally unique identifier (or GUID).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Int16 = int32(10)

Docs.summary: An integral type representing signed 16-bit integers with values between -32768 and 32767.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Int32 = int32(11)

Docs.summary: An integral type representing signed 32-bit integers with values between -2147483648 and 2147483647.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Int64 = int32(12)

Docs.summary: An integral type representing signed 64-bit integers with values between -9223372036854775808 and 9223372036854775807.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Object = int32(13)

Docs.summary: A general type representing any reference or value type not explicitly represented by another value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType SByte = int32(14)

Docs.summary: An integral type representing signed 8-bit integers with values between -128 and 127.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Single = int32(15)

Docs.summary: A floating point type representing values ranging from approximately 1.5 x 10 -45 to 3.4 x 10 38 with a precision of 7 digits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType String = int32(16)

Docs.summary: A type representing Unicode character strings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType StringFixedLength = int32(23)

Docs.summary: A fixed-length string of Unicode characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Time = int32(17)

Docs.summary: A type representing a SQL Server value. If you want to use a SQL Server value, use .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType UInt16 = int32(18)

Docs.summary: An integral type representing unsigned 16-bit integers with values between 0 and 65535.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType UInt32 = int32(19)

Docs.summary: An integral type representing unsigned 32-bit integers with values between 0 and 4294967295.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType UInt64 = int32(20)

Docs.summary: An integral type representing unsigned 64-bit integers with values between 0 and 18446744073709551615.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType VarNumeric = int32(21)

Docs.summary: A variable-length numeric value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DbType Xml = int32(25)

Docs.summary: A parsed representation of an XML document or fragment.
